import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup,Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import { createOrder } from '../actions/orderActions' //import { ORDER_CREATE_RESET } from '../constants/orderConstants' //import { USER_DETAILS_RESET } from '../constants/userConstants' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const order = useSelector((state) => state.order) // Calculate prices const addDecimals = (num) => { return (Math.round(num * 100) / 100).toFixed(2) } // order.sendAmount = addDecimals( // order.sendAmount.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.sendAmount, 0) // ) console.log('SENDAMOUNT',order.sendAmount ) order.shippingAmount = addDecimals(order.sendAmount.fromAmount * 0.10, 0) order.totalAmount = ( Number(order.sendAmount.fromAmount) + Number(order.shippingAmount ) ).toFixed(2) order.sendAmount.fromAmount = Number(order.sendAmount.fromAmount) order.sendAmount.toAmount = Number(order.sendAmount.toAmount).toFixed(2) console.log('N',order.sendAmount.fromAmount) //cart.totalPrice = Number(cart.itemsPrice + cart.taxPrice).toFixed(2) console.log('TOTAL AMOUNT',order.totaAmount ) const orderCreate = useSelector(state => state.orderCreate) //const { placeorder, success, error } = orderCreate const { success, error } = orderCreate useEffect(() => { if(success) { //history.push(`/order/${order._id}`) //history.push('/payment') console.log('Transaction: ',success) } // eslint-disable-next-line }, [history,success]) const submitTransactionHandler = () => { dispatch(createOrder({ orderAmount: order.sendAmount, shippingAmount: order.shippingAmount, //transaction fee recipientAddress: order.recipientAddress, totalAmount: order.totalAmount, //transaction fee + fromAmount exchangeRate: order.exchangeRate, sendCountry: order.sendCountry })) } return ( <>

Recipient Address

<> {order.recipientAddress.firName} {order.recipientAddress.middleName} {' '} {order.recipientAddress.lastName},{' '} {order.recipientAddress.address}, {order.recipientAddress.town},{' '} {order.recipientAddress.country},{' '} {order.recipientAddress.email} {order.recipientAddress.phone},{' '} {order.recipientAddress.reason} {/*

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod} */}

Transaction Summary

 Paying €{order.sendAmount.fromAmount} Transaction Fee ${order.shippingAmount} Exchange Rate € 1 = {order.sendAmount.exchangeRate} Total Amount ${order.totalAmount} Your Receiver Gets $ {order.sendAmount.toAmount} {error && {error}} {/* ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
